ModMetaData.name: Medieval Hemogen Pack Retexture (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Kerbeh
ModMetaData.description: Re-upload of Kerbeh's mod for 1.5 with a few changes. Will apply medieval retexture/rename of VRE Sanguophage hemogen packs if mod is loaded. Will apply medieval retexture/rename of base game hemogen pack if House Sanguin is not loaded.
